ygData.msgSnippet: Beloved theres that word again, and again, He ralized her trick, just a little closer and she d wish she d never have messed with his internal sensory array

"Beloved theres that word again, and again,"He ralized her trick, 
just a little closer and she'd wish she'd never have messed with his 
internal sensory array (Emotions)

Instead of coming closer she flew upward, "What's your game Wing" he 
thought as he stood as a vulnerable target. Instead of attacking she 
returned with a blue jay (Do they have those in Tibet?)

"One must be strong in order to fight." Those words struck him like a 
kick in the teeth.

"You're calling me week?" The wolf again transformed into his bot 
mode, the sharp curved claws which were a moment ago on the wolfs 
front legs now took thier place on his wrists.

With a quick backhanded slash the claws sliced through the tree next 
to the one Shadow Wing was perched upon. with a mighty crash the tree 
fell toward the owl.(If a tree falls and there's two bots around to 
hear it does it make a sound?

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::Shadow Wing::
> 
> She looked away from Lunarpine for a moment.  She took off in 
flight 
> and flew off into the trees.  She returned a few moments later with 
a 
> blue jay in her talons. She perched back at the same low branch 
that 
> she was on moments ago.  "How about this instead of a rock?" She 
let 
> go of the bird and let it fall near Lunarpine.
> "One must be strong in order to fight."
> She smiled and waited for him to eat the bird and then continue 
with 
> the game.  She really wanted to learn how to fight in hand to hand 
> combat, but not quite like this. But for now, this would suffice.
